entry.source: I would like to ask a child of man to slay a{F801}certain being for me. Its name is {F804,5}{F873,1},{F804,0}{F801}an entity that broke away from God to become{F801}the ruler of the silent world. I will use my{F801}powers to link the {F804,5}Sky Tower{F804,0} to its home{F801}dimension temporarily. Please come to my aid.{F801}
